games.title: Planet Crafter
games.description: A space survival open world terraforming crafting game, designed for 1 to 10 players. Alter the ecosystem of an inhospitable planet to render it habitable for humanity. Survive, gather resources, and build your base. Then, generate oxygen, warmth, and pressure to create a brand new biosphere.
games.comment: Bra survival-spel med tillfredställande progression där planeten blir mer och mer grön.

games.title: Void Crew
games.description: Void Crew is a Chaotic, Co-op Roguelite game for 1 to 4 players: Outfit your spaceship and crew for thrilling quests, brave fierce enemies in Space Battles... and try not to panic!
games.comment: Rogue-like rymdspel där alla har en roll på skeppet. Betydligt mer action än det där andra rymdspelet vi spelade.

games.title: Helldivers 2
games.description: The Galaxy’s Last Line of Offence. Enlist in the Helldivers and join the fight for freedom across a hostile galaxy in a fast, frantic, and ferocious third-person shooter.
games.comment: Episk insekt- och robotslakt.

games.title: Astroneer
games.description: Interact with strange new worlds in a unique and tactile way, molding the environment itself as if it were clay in your hands. Build your base, master resource management, automate your production lines, and more as you unravel the mysteries of the universe, alone or with friends.
games.comment: Utforska planeter, samla resurser, bygg maskiner och fordon.

games.title: Satisfactory
games.description: Satisfactory is a first-person open-world factory building game with a dash of exploration and combat. Play alone or with friends, explore an alien planet, create multi-story factories, and enter conveyor belt heaven!
games.comment: The factory must grow!

games.title: Abiotic Factor
games.description: Abiotic Factor is a survival crafting experience for 1-6 players set in the depths of an underground research facility. Caught between paranormal containment failure, a military crusade, and chaos from a dozen realms, the world’s greatest minds must survive against the universe’s biggest threats.
games.comment: Tänk om Half-Life var ett multiplayer open world survival-spel.

games.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide
games.description: Take back the city of Tertium from hordes of bloodthirsty foes in this intense and brutal action shooter. Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is the new co-op focused experience from the award-winning team behind the Vermintide series. As Tertium falls, Rejects Will Rise.
games.comment: Horde-shooter. Brukade vara kasst, är eventuellt bättre nu.

games.title: Crab Champions
games.description: Claw your way across exotic islands combining fluid movement with fast paced combat to become a Crab Champion in this third person shooter with roguelike elements.
games.comment: Rogue-like crab shooter. Tight action, men inte så djupt.

games.title: Scrap Mechanic
games.description: Enter the creative paradise of Scrap Mechanic! Build fantastic machines, go on adventures with your friends and defend against waves of evil Farmbots in this imaginative multiplayer survival sandbox. With Scrap Mechanic’s powerful creation tools you can engineer your own adventures!
games.comment: Som Trailmakers fast med fiender och basbyggande.

games.title: Sea of Thieves
games.description: Sea of Thieves is a smash-hit pirate adventure game, offering the quintessential pirate experience of plundering lost treasures, intense battles, vanquishing sea monsters and more. Dive in with this revised edition of the game, which includes access to digital bonus media.
games.comment: Jag kan spela Monkey Island-temat på dragspel!

games.title: Ghost Recon: Wildlands
games.description: Create a team with up to 3 friends in Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon® Wildlands and enjoy the ultimate military shooter experience set in a massive, dangerous, and responsive open world.
games.comment: Panga skurkar tillsammans i en stor öppen värld.

games.title: SWAT 4
games.description: The adrenaline is always high as you carry on the legendary SWAT® tradition – leading an elite squad of tactical experts into hard-hitting action that delves deeply into every detail of the experience. In a city rife with armed felons and explosive situations, only the unique skills of your men will do – because when SWAT gets the call, there is no other option.
games.comment: Panga skurkar under kontrollerade former. Har en DRM-fri installer från GOG.

games.title: Risk of Rain 2
games.description: Escape a chaotic alien planet by fighting through hordes of frenzied monsters – with your friends, or on your own. Combine loot in surprising ways and master each character until you become the havoc you feared upon your first crash landing.
games.comment: Tidsbaserat rogue-like där fienderna blir svårare ju längre tid man tar på sig. Coola uppgraderingar.

games.title: Deep Rock Galactic
games.description: Deep Rock Galactic is a 1-4 player co-op FPS featuring badass space Dwarves, 100% destructible environments, procedurally-generated caves, and endless hordes of alien monsters.
games.comment: Rock and stone, brother!

games.title: Titanfall 2
games.description: Respawn Entertainment gives you the most advanced titan technology in its new, single player campaign & multiplayer experience. Combine & conquer with new titans & pilots, deadlier weapons, & customization and progression systems that help you and your titan flow as one unstoppable killing force.
games.comment: Stora robotar, mycket pangande.

games.title: Human Fall Flat
games.description: Human Fall Flat is a hilarious, light-hearted platformer set in floating dreamscapes that can be played solo or with up to 8 players online. Free new levels keep its vibrant community rewarded.
games.comment: Det har tillkommit många nya banor sedan vi spelade det en gång i tiden.

games.title: Trailmakers
games.description: Build the ultimate vehicle and explore a vast open world filled with challenges and adventure. Play solo or team up with friends in multiplayer to conquer the toughest obstacles. With a thrilling campaign mode and endless creative possibilities, Trailmakers is the ultimate sandbox for adventurers.
games.comment: Bygg fordon, leta nya delar.

games.title: Core Keeper
games.description: Explore a vast cavern of creatures, relics and resources in a mining sandbox adventure for 1-8 players. Mine, build, fight, craft and farm to unravel the mystery of the ancient Core.
games.comment: Version 1.0 är ute, vet inte riktigt vad som är nytt sen sist vi spelade.

games.title: Enshrouded
games.description: You are Flameborn, last ember of hope of a dying race. Awaken, survive the terror of a corrupting fog, and reclaim the lost beauty of your kingdom. Venture into a vast world, vanquish punishing bosses, build grand halls and forge your path in this co-op survival action RPG for up to 16 players.
games.comment: Tror vi bara skrapade på ytan sist, finns rätt mycket mer att upptäcka.

games.title: Valheim
games.description: A brutal exploration and survival game for 1-10 players, set in a procedurally-generated purgatory inspired by viking culture. Battle, build, and conquer your way to a saga worthy of Odin’s patronage!
games.comment: Finns säkert mer att upptäcka här med.
